Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."

I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. of a fire raging through the nearby headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party in downtown Cairo, intruders climbed the gates, broke a window and entered the museum in a bid to steal the mummies. But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged, Zahi Hawass said.
